law.catch_line: Representation by person having substantially identical interest.
law.text: Unless otherwise represented, a minor, incapacitated, or unborn individual, or a person whose identity or location is unknown and not reasonably ascertainable, may be represented by and bound by another having a substantially identical interest with respect to the particular question or dispute, but only to the extent there is no conflict of interest between the representative and the person represented.
law.history: Created 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 25, sec. 21, effective July 15, 2014.
